Text:
Don't expect great picture quality.

I watched the source 
( The.Infidel.2010.720p.LiMiTED.BluRay.x264.AVCHD ) (4.35 GB) and it looks like a faked(upscaled) 720p. I don't doubt it was ripped from blue-ray because if you look at the snap shots at blue-ray.com the quality will be near the same;  http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/The-Infidel-Blu-ray/11807/
It's a bit disappointing, still the movie is great but it's not worth to go for a 1080p release when ever will be around.

In fact the rip looks less pixelated then the Blue-ray, the encoder must have used denoise filter (and deblock 0.0 which is good).
Here is the rip:
http://www.bilderkiste.org/show/original/5129345689950/The.Infidel.2010.720p.LiMiTED.BluRay.x264.AVCHD].jpg

blue-ray:
http://images.blu-ray.com/reviews/3165_1_large.jpg
So the rip looks better in my opinion, so it's a cool release.
